==Features==
-Simple interface, vivid images
-Default GPS positioning the current location, but also manually select the other regions to see the weather and temperature
-Automatically show the whole day temperature, the current temperature, body  temperature, no need to refresh
-Supports Fahrenheit temperature and Celsius temperature selection

Trying to avoid walking straight into a rainstorm when you go out? Check our rain radar and rain graph before you leave so you never have to get drenched!
	
De Buienradar app starts with the 3 hour or the 24 hour rain radar forecast. The rain radar image will show you whether it is going to rain in the next upcoming hours or even the next day. Below the radar is the rain graph. In this graph you can see exactly when it is going to rain and how much rainfall is predicted (in millimeters). If you prefer an even more detailed image of your city or town you can press the magnifying glass icon to zoom in.

The Buienradar app is suitable for iPhone and iPad. Via the handy widgets (with rain graph for your current location) you can quickly see on your today's screen whether it will rain soon without opening the app. The widget is now also visible with 3D touch: press the Buienradar app icon a little harder in your app overview to make the widget appear.

Besides the Buienradar you can also find other radars and maps:
- Drizzle
- Sun 
- NL Satellite images
- Storm
- Pollen (hay fever)
- Sun (UV)
- Mosquitos
- BBQ
- Temperature
- Feeling temperature
- Wind
- Fog
- Snow
- EU Buienradar (rain radar)
- EU Satellite images

You can find personalized weather info in the table “Komende uren in” (Next 8 hours weather prediction) for your favorite location (even abroad!) like hour-to-hour predictions for: temperature, feeling temperature, the number of millimeters of rain per hour, the chance of rain and wind force (in Beaufort).

Besides thunderstorm, snow, sun, wind and temperature maps we also offer wind chill, ground temperature, sun intensity, air pressure, gusts, visibility and humidity data, together with the exact times of sunrise and sunset for your location.

We also offer seasonal radar maps. In the summer, for example, you can use our pollen and mosquito radars in order to receive a timely notification when it is wise to hang up your mosquito net. In the winter you can use our snowradar, which informs you about winter precipitation, but we also offer a map especially for ground temperature which warns you about night frost.

In the “14-daagse” tab (14 day forecast) you will find the weather forecast (in a graph) for the next 14 days. You can also see a detailed list view when you click on the tab “Lijst”. This list offers an hourly forecast for the next 7 days and a daily average for the second week.

In the “Meldingen” tab you can create your own rain alert (free push notification) customized to your daily time schedule and favorite locations so you will never be unprepared for rain or a storm.

If you don't want to see ads, we also offer the Buienradar Plus plan for €3,49 per year. You can find this easily in “Instellingen” (“Settings”) and then press “Neem Buienradar Plus” (Get Buienradar Plus).

Our Terms of Use can be found here:
https://privacy.rtl.nl/gebruikers-voorwaarden.html

https://privacy.rtl.nl/privacy-statement.html

The official Belgian weather forecast by the RMI

• Forecasts and observations for any Belgian commune
The local geographic particularities are taken into account in the forecasts.

• Hourly forecasts for the next 48 hours
Get the local forecast for any Belgian commune for temperature, precipitation, wind and atmospheric pressure.

• Daily forecasts for the next 7 days
 For any Belgian commune: minimum and maximum temperatures, wind, weather type and descriptive texts (only in NL or FR).

• 14 days of trends
Long term forecasts for day and night temperatures and precipitations.

• Radar: observations and rain forecasts
Observations and forecasts of precipitations per 10 minute time step for your favorite Belgian communes (up to 3 hours in advance).
• Daily notification of the weather forecast
Be prepared for the weather everyday

• Notifications of weather flashes
 In order to be informed from 10 minutes to maximum one hour in advance that intense rain or winter precipitations will happen 

• Meteorological warnings
Notification push in case of meteorological warnings: customizable for each province and for each warning level.

 • Pollen, UV, sunrise and sunset time

 • Send us your weather observations 
Take a look outside and share your current weather with everyone on a clickable map of Belgium 

• Widget
Keep an eye on the weather of your favorite commune with the widgets.

The app combines highly accurate weather forecast for your location with a 3D map showing development of weather in a broader area in a very interesting way. This allows you to see where precipitation is going to come from or where the wind is blowing from. The uniqueness of the app comes from the amount of data displayed. Forecast of weather, precipitation, wind, cloud cover, atmospheric pressure, snow cover and other meteorological data for different altitudes is available for the whole world. 

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

Why did we make this app?


As avid anglers ourselves we constantly use weather apps to plan and guide our fishing sessions. Our team has been using a multitude of apps from many different countries, all with their own strengths and weaknesses. At some point we thought: ‘’How cool would it be if we could combine the best features out there in one simple to use app’’? Not only that, it would also need to cover most of Europe so that when you travel abroad on your fishing adventures you could rely on the same quality features you’ve gotten accustomed to. This is exactly what we did! After 3 long years with a team of weather specialist, incredible developers and some of the most experienced anglers in Europe we pulled it off. 


Our app has now:


-Industry beating radar forecast for the better part of Europe, including the Scandinavia countries and the UK. It shows you exactly how the precipitation event is going to develop over the next two hours. See where or if there're gaps in the rain event and plan accordingly. Depending on the terrain accuracy varies from 0-10 minutes. This is the most accurate rainfall forecast possible in the world. When you go fishing never get caught out in the rain anymore.


-Numerical weather forecasting that is accurate and easy to read. That includes all the parameters that you need to plan your session.  Plus switch from daily view to hourly view with one tap of the screen.


-Do you plan your sessions around the moon phases? With our moon screen it’s super easy to find out when your favorite phase is going to occur. Just scroll the month and/or phase carousel and see the date appear within seconds.


-Do you fish the rivers a lot? We’ve got the most comprehensive database that can call for live water level, drain, tide and temperature in an ever expanding list of countries. 


-We all know wind is a big factor in how smoothly a fishing day can go. With our wind animation it is super easy to see the direction of the wind in relation to the water’s edge. Skip through the forecast by simply sliding the cursor left or right instantly see the animation change in wind direction and speed. 

And the best thing yet. It is absolutely free!!

Barometer Plus app measures air pressure and altitude using your device's built-in barometric pressure sensor.
Because air pressure changes usually indicate a weather change, you can use this app to monitor and predict short-term weather variations.
People suffering from migraine, headaches, or joint pain can monitor how barometric pressure impacts their mood.
Fishermen can monitor the atmospheric pressure for right-time fishing.

FEATURES:
• The app contains a barometer and altimeter with a personalization graphic in classic analog style. It also displays the current temperature and humidity.
• Display barometric pressure (sensor value) or mean sea level pressure (MSLP - value used in weather forecast services or stations).
• Units support for pressure: mb, inHg, kPa, atm, Torr, psi, hPa, mmHg. Units for altitude: meter, feet.
• Calibrate the barometer using altitude/location from the GPS. Calibrate the altimeter using the nearest airport information/METAR, or manually enter the QNH of the nearest airport. Offset sensor output value.
• Measure the height (building/mountain/hiked/climbed) using the "Relative Altitude" feature (can be enabled in the app's Settings).
• Notification about pressure change. "Notification custom rule" for you to define how and when the app sends notifications.
Notify when air pressure changes indicate that extreme or worse weather may occur.
• "Pressure Tracking" and "History Graph" require "Background App Refresh" or "Always Location Service" with "Exact update interval" (paid feature) enabled.
• "My Area" allows you to define your frequent stay places, and the app tracks air pressure with location data.
• Export history to CSV format and Today widget (paid features).
• This app is the digital version compared with an aneroid or mercury barometer and can be adjusted to MSLP with additional features.

CUSTOMIZABLE:
You can change your barometer/altimeter appearance with:
• Seven different housing colors.
• Black, white or blue disk background.
• Four different app backgrounds.
• Three different types of needles.
• Marker needle for easily monitor.
• Dark or light Today widget theme.

NOTES:
• App only works on devices with a barometer sensor, such as iPhone 6/6s/7/8/X/11/12/13 (including Plus models), iPad Mini 4/Air 2/Pro, or later.
• Weather icons on the dial: This only shows the air pressure trend like in an analog barometer.
• Each time your device reboots, open the app for tracking with the "Exact update interval" feature work.
• You may take the phone/tablet far away from computers, cables, and other magnetic sources to get accurate results.

Annuaire des marées - France, Belgique et iles Anglo-Normandes.
©SHOM Licence 124/2017.

marée.info - Horaire, hauteur et coefficient de marée

146 ports :
• France métropolitaine : de Dunkerque à Saint-Jean-de-Luz
• Belgique : Nieuwpoort, Oostende, Zeebrugge
• Anglo-Normandes : Alderney, Guernsey, Jersey

De la consultation simple aux calculs de hauteur d'eau pour naviguer :
• l'horloge des marées pour la marée du moment, 
• le calendrier des coefficients avec recherche, 
• le menu calendrier avec les coefficients et les phases de la lune, 
• les prédictions en détail avec le marégramme et les calculs,
• la vue rapide des 7 jours (volet à droite pour les abonnés).

Pratique : Le coefficient s'affiche en pastille sur l'icône de l'application pour le dernier port consulté. Des notifications peuvent être activées pour les pleines mers et basses mers lorsque l'application est inactive (voir Réglages). 

Pour plus de fiabilité et sécurité en mer, l'application fonctionne sans internet. Seules l'installation, les mises à jour et la gestion des abonnements nécessitent une connexion 4G ou WIFI. Assurez-vous que tout fonctionne avant de partir en mer.

= Version sans abonnement  (gratuit)

Accès aux prédictions des marées du jour ainsi qu'au calendrier des coefficients de l'année.

= Abonnement 1/6/12 mois (achats intégrés)

Accès complet aux prédictions des marées disponibles. 

FONCTIONS :

- Le sélecteur de port : 
Il permet de passer d'un port à l'autre et de gérer vos favoris. Une horloge sur chaque port permet un rapide coup d'oeil sur l'état de la marée. 

- L'horloge des marées : 
L'horloge vous donne l'état de la marée à l'instant T pour le port sélectionné. L'aiguille tourne dans le sens des aiguilles d'une montre. Lorsque l'aiguille est à droite du cadran, la mer descend de Pleine Mer à Basse Mer puis l'aiguille passe à gauche du cadran pour la marée montante (de basse mer à pleine mer). Le coefficient est indiqué dans le petite fenêtre de l'horloge. 

- Le marégramme interactif : 
La courbe représente la hauteur d'eau en fonction des heures. Sur le graphique du jour un "flotteur" rouge indique le niveau de la mer. Un tap sur le flotteur affiche les détails dans la fenêtre supérieure (un tap dans le marégramme annule cet affichage). 
Pour activer la ligne de seuil, touchez et maintenez un point sur la courbe puis déplacez le, soit horizontalement pour suivre les heures, soit verticalement pour régler la hauteur. 
Le marégramme s'affiche en plus grand en mode paysage ou par 2 taps. 
Un tap sur les heures de lever et coucher du soleil affiche ou masque la limite jour/nuit. 

- Les calculs (seuil, sonde et tirant d'eau) : 
Un tap sur les heures ou les hauteurs de la vue supérieure active les roues de sélection. Soit en valeur absolue selon l'heure ou hauteur indiquée. Soit en valeur relative par rapport à la pleine ou basse mer. 

- Le calendrier : 
Coefficients, fêtes, jours fériés. La "loupe" active la recherche par critères. Ex: les grandes marées (coef >=100) pour samedi et dimanche.

- Widget Aujourd'hui : l'horloge du dernier port consulté s'affiche dans le centre de notification
- Continuité (handoff) de l'application/site entre 2 appareils iPhone/iPad/Mac
- Raccourcis Siri : "Dis Siri, quelle est la marée?"

N'hésitez pas à me contacter par Facebook, Twitter ou mail
Guillaume - http://maree.info

En utilisant cette application vous vous engagez à lire et à accepter les conditions générales d'utilisations (CGU) et avertissements. Vous acceptez également que vous êtes conscients des dangers que peut avoir le phénomène des marées ainsi que les potentielles sources d'erreur ou de non fiabilité des appareils informatiques. Aussi, vous utilisez les informations sous votre pleine et entière responsabilité.

L'application « Météo-France Ski et Neige », application gratuite de Météo-France pour les sports d'hiver, a été entièrement repensée.
Elle s'adresse à tous les pratiquants de sports d'hiver quelle que soit leur activité :
Ski de piste, ski hors-pistes, snow-board, ski de fond, luge, raquettes, ski de randonnée…

« Météo-France ski et Neige» couvre l'ensemble des massifs montagneux français : les Alpes, les Pyrénées, le Massif Central, les Vosges et le Jura, sans oublier la Corse ainsi que les stations d'Andorre avec des prévisions météo, des informations sur l'enneigement, les bulletins de risques d'avalanche, et les données actualisées pour chacune des 250 stations proposées parmi lesquelles Tignes, Les Arcs, La Mongie, Super-Besse, les Rousses et La Plagne.
Dès la page d'accueil la recherche d'une station est simplifiée, grâce à une carte zoomable ou via votre liste de favoris. L'activation de la géo-localisation sur votre appareil permet de se positionner facilement et d'accéder aux stations les plus proches.
Sélectionnez jusqu'à 6 stations dans vos favoris pour les retrouver rapidement sur votre écran d'accueil.

Pour chacune des stations, 4 niveaux d'informations sont disponibles :

1. Les prévisions météo :
o Le temps prévu pour les 14 prochains jours, avec des échéances toutes les 3 heures pour les 3 premiers jours.
o Les températures minimales et maximales et le vent en bas et en haut des pistes, les rafales, les chutes de neige ou la pluie, ainsi que l'altitude de l'iso 0°C et de la limite pluie/neige pour chaque période.
o L'indice UV pour les 4 premiers jours

2. L'enneigement :
o Hauteur de neige en bas et en haut du domaine skiable
o Date de la dernière chute de neige
o Etat de la neige (fraiche, poudreuse, mouillée, verglacée, ….)
o Epaisseur de neige hors-piste à différentes altitudes sur les versants Sud et les versants Nord du domaine
o Altitude d'enneigement continu
o De nouveaux Bulletins Montagne Neige et Avalanches, plus complets, rédigés par massif (Vercors, Mont-Blanc, Queyras…) pour les zones de haute Montagne.

3. Les pistes :
o Le nombre de pistes de ski ouvertes par catégories (vertes, bleues, rouges ou noires)
o Le pourcentage total d'ouverture des pistes du domaine skiable
o L'accès du snow-park et du half-pipe lorsque la station en est équipée.
o Le nombre de kilomètres de pistes de ski de fond ouvertes
o L'épaisseur de la couche de neige en haut et en bas des installations

4. La station :
o Des informations utiles pour votre séjour, telles que les coordonnées de l'office de tourisme
o L'accès direct aux webcams de chaque station pour vérifier les conditions d'enneigement, d'ensoleillement, de fréquentation des pistes
Et toujours un accès à la carte de vigilance par le menu principal.

Aurora Alerts is an app designed to monitor real-time auroral activity and push alert to let you know if there may be aurora borealis (northern lights) visible tonight. Whenever you are home or away, Aurora Alerts will notify you if the possibility of seeing the northern lights exists.

Main features:
- short-term aurora forecast for next hour with weather conditions and moon Illumination
- long-term aurora forecast for the next 3 days with weather conditions  
- long-term northern lights forecast for the next 27 days
- show probability to see Northern Lights based on your or custom location 
- current auroral activity (based on observed and predicted Kp Indices from U.S. Air Force Weather Agency)
- weather forecast to check visibility conditions before planning to see northern lights 
- solar wind data directly from the NASA satellite (wind speed, Bz, Bt and density)
- unlike many other apps, it uses the local time instead of UTC

Alerts: 
- when northern lights may be visible at current or custom location at the horizon or overhead
- Kp index reaches chosen value
- solar wind data reach chosen values
- you can filter out alerts based on time of the day

Boost your chances of viewing the northern lights!
